level.heading: Insurance; performance bond; indemnification of District.
Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 3 of Cable Television Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-409, July 15, 2002, 49 DCR 7280).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-142
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-142, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-1201.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-36
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-36, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-1202.01.
